basics.name: Victoria Valverde
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Computer Science graduate with hands-on experience in cybersecurity, risk analysis, and IT systems. My background includes software engineering, application security, and technical troubleshooting, complemented by leadership and problem-solving skills developed during my time in the U.S. Marine Corps. I am passionate about cybersecurity risk management, compliance, and securing digital environments. Currently pursuing CompTIA Security+ to deepen my knowledge in security frameworks. Seeking opportunities in cybersecurity, risk, and compliance to apply my skills in protecting organizations from emerging threats.

education.note: Completed while on active duty in the U.S. Marine Corps.
